item.description:
Dig out those Bell Bottom Pants, Platform Shoes & gold Chains. Make your hair appointments to have an Afro or a perm because we are off to the Discoteque.

2/4/10 UPDATE: When you call for your ticket please make sure you tell them that you are reserving with Meetup.com under Donna/Janets group.. Thank you!!!



Do you remember the music of Earth Wind & Fire, Bee Gees & Gloria Gaynor? Remember dancing to The Hustle, YMCA, Get Down Tonight and Disco Inferno?

Well this event will bring back all those memories. Lets go out to the Tewksbury Country Club and dance to the tunes of the 70's & 80's played by legendary Curtis Knight.

Tickets are only $10.00 but you MUST call and reserve your ticket in advance or email the TCC to reserve your ticket. Last year tickets sold out quickly so make sure you call and get a ticket reserved soon. Please include in your RSVP when you have called and reserved a ticket.

This is event is posted on our 3 Meetup sites and I know of 3 other Meetup groups that have posted this event also.

For tickets please call: 978-640-0033 ext.10 or go to this website:
http://www.tewksburyc...
item.how_to_find_us: Meet us in the lobby (until 8pm) After 8pm look for the meetup table
item.name: Disco Night at Tewksbury Country Club
